There was no mention about changing the stats given of the runes, so lets look at it this way:

T1 runes give roughly 60% of the stats of T3 runes. Currently, the cheapest T3 runes are 410 IP. So T1 runes are about 1% of the cost for T3 runes. So you get 60% of the stats for about 1% of the cost.

Using T3 runes as a baseline, T1 runes will be about 6000% IP efficient. Thats not a bad deal if you want to focus on getting new champs over grinding runes.

It already provides that information. There is an option to buy up to 9 of a rune at a time, and it will not let you set that number such that you would end up with more than 9 total. So if you already have 5 of a rune, for instance, and go to buy some more of it, that counter will not go past 4.
